title: How to Record Snapchat Videos Without Holding The Button Down

steps.title: Press and hold the record button.
steps.content: Press and hold the record button. This is the big button at the bottom of the screen, above the "Memories" button. It's the button that you usually hold down to capture a video .

steps.title: Slide your finger to the left.
steps.content: Slide your finger to the left. This will lock the recording of the video so it'll remain recording when you let go of your phone to make the rest of the video. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the "Stop" button when done.
steps.content: Tap the "Stop" button when done. Then, edit your video and send it to friends . [2] X Research source
